memberdef.name: fluid_mod_has_source
memberdef.initializer: ( ((((mod)->src1 == ctrl) && (((mod)->flags1 & FLUID_MOD_CC) != 0) && (cc != 0)) \ || ((((mod)->src1 == ctrl) && (((mod)->flags1 & FLUID_MOD_CC) == 0) && (cc == 0)))) \ || ((((mod)->src2 == ctrl) && (((mod)->flags2 & FLUID_MOD_CC) != 0) && (cc != 0)) \ || ((((mod)->src2 == ctrl) && (((mod)->flags2 & FLUID_MOD_CC) == 0) && (cc == 0)))))
